trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> object, which is the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintJobSettings.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> property, holds all the detailed settings for a print job.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>物件，它是值的<xref:System.Printing.PrintJobSettings.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>屬性，會保留所有列印工作的詳細的設定。</xref:System.Printing.PrintJobSettings.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: The parent, PrintJobSettings, adds only a description.
> [!CAUTION] > Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 類別內<xref:System.Printing>命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空間。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> object that holds all the detailed settings for the print job.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>保存所有列印工作的詳細的設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Setting this CurrentPrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個 CurrentPrintTicket 屬性不會驗證或修改指定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>這是適用於給定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> object that holds all the details about the print job, such as the number of copies to print, and whether stapling or duplex printing is used.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>物件，其中保存有關列印工作，例如要列印的份數的所有詳細資料，以及是否使用裝訂或雙面列印。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of a print job.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定列印工作的描述。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the print job, for example, "Quarterly Report."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>描述列印工作，例如，「 每季報表。 」</xref:System.String>
